games.name: Project: Coreline
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 203306.png](///raw/c87/d5/z/6a62b.png)
_The Core is dying._

_The Earth's inner layers have become unstable, triggering massive quakes, extreme weather, and ecological collapse. To prevent total destruction, a massive drilling machine‚ÄîThe Core Excavator‚Äîhas been built._

_Your mission is to keep it alive._

_Build a self-sustaining surface base, manage resources, grow food, and power the machine. The deeper it drills, the harsher the heat, pressure, and challenges you'll face._

_You're not the hero._

_You're the system that keeps the hero running._

_Humanity's survival depends on your efficiency._

**About:**
Project: coreline is a city builder/ base building where you need to manager the resources to complete the stages until you the special project is complete.

__HOW TO PLAY__

**AWSD** or Arrows to move de camera. (also hold right click and drag).
**Left Click** to build and select.
**Right Click** to cancel building order.

You need to give materials to **The Core Excavator**, that is the big hexagonal building close to where you appear.

Residences: Give you workers slots but consume food.
Farms: Give you food but consume a bit of energy
Industry: Produce materials but need workers and energy.
Power Plants: Produce Energy but consume materials.

if you ever have negative food, workers or energy, you building will continue to work but at half the efficency.


![Screenshot 2025-04-07 203755.png](///raw/c87/d5/z/6a62a.png)

games.name: Avoid the void
games.body:
![Web_Portada.jpg](///raw/e7f/d5/z/6a781.jpg)

Walk across an endless old bridge, trying to escape a creature emerging from the depths, while keeping your balance against the wind. Mmm... yeah, looks like we made a difficult game again. Sorry, mates.

![donotfogme.gif](///raw/e7f/d5/z/6a990.gif)

We were inspired by PS1 graphics and the fog in Silent Hill (which, back in those days, was used to hide technical limitations. We used it to hide our lack of time, haha).

![Monster_Web.jpg](///raw/e7f/d5/z/6a78f.jpg)

Hope you enjoy it!

Btw: We recommend headphones and gamepad :)

games.name: Is Water Wet?
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 at 9.12.19‚ÄØPM.png](///raw/7db/z/6afd0.png)

A Gelato Labs production for Ludum Dare 57 "Depths"

Dive bravely into the vast depths of the ocean to seek enlightenment by answering the age-old question: Is water wet?

Great fishlosophers will push you to ponder this mind-bending debate in ways once thought unfathomable!

But you may wonder how this is possible?  Don't fret - the best means to answer a question of this caliber is quite simple - by asking more questions!

Remember, you may only pose three questions for each fishlosopher so frame each one carefully!

In order to help guide your journey there are tests of speed and accuracy along the way that will offer you partial clues to key words in which to inquire.

Now venture forth and make the unknown known!

The Gelato Labs "G-Team" for LD57 is:

Kyle Farwell (kfarwell): Programming, Writing, Art

Ryan Refcio: Writing, Programming

FuuGhoul: Art

![Screenshot 2025-04-07 at 9.12.57‚ÄØPM.png](///raw/7db/z/6afcb.png)

games.name: A Hill to Die For
games.body:
**Grow your ant colony, escape the Anteater!**


# How to Play
As the ant queen of this hill, your job is to not get eaten by the ant eater! Dig deeper into the ground; collect stone and food to build more rooms to birth more ants to control! When you're in a pinch, your children will not hesitate for even a nanosecond to sacrifice their life for the hill! Can you reach the depths of the Earth, or will the ever-encroaching tongue be your demise?

# Controls
- Move the Camera - Left Click
- Select Ant - Left Click
- Dig - Hold Right Click and Drag
- Pause - ESC 

# Credits

games.name: Below
games.body:
Controls: WASD, QE for ascent and descent. Escape (for an obvious purpose). And whatever you see in the game.


üåä Below
A survival base-builder set in the cold, crushing dark

The surface is a memory. The abyss is your reality.

You awaken to the dim hum of failing systems and the creak of metal under immense pressure. All around you: endless black. Your submarine ‚Äî your only way home ‚Äî lies shattered on the ocean floor. A mangled silhouette against the void, lifeless and unreachable. You're trapped in a battered submersible, a bubble of flickering light in a sea of silence.

Welcome to the bottom of the world.

In Below, you take on the role of a stranded deep-sea explorer, forced to adapt, build, and survive in one of the most hostile environments imaginable. Scavenge from the wreckage of your ship. Harvest glowing kelp, mineral-rich stones, and ancient wrecks littered with forgotten technology. Every resource is hard-earned. Every venture into the black is a calculated risk.

Out there in the murk, sea mines drift quietly ‚Äî relics of forgotten conflicts or perhaps left behind by something that still waits. They don't blink. They don't warn. They end you.

Your only hope is to expand your fragile outpost into something more ‚Äî a lifeline built from scraps, powered by makeshift engines and your will to live. Craft processing units. Channel limited power. Build airlocks, fabricators, and repair stations. All of it working toward one goal:

Bring the submarine back online. And rise.

But the deeper you go ‚Äî the longer you stay ‚Äî the more it starts to feel like you're not alone down here. The silence isn't empty. It listens.

üéÆ Features
üõ† Base-building and resource management in a vast underwater trench

‚öôÔ∏è Processing and power systems designed for survival under pressure

üí£ Navigate a mine-infested seabed ‚Äî one mistake and it‚Äôs over

üå´ Immersive fog and low visibility amplify the tension

üß≠ Explore, upgrade, and unlock the tools needed to escape

üß© A complete single-level experience with an emotional arc

games.name: Depth of your Thoughts
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-06 172752.png](///raw/fc6/36/z/699c0.png)

So here it is : a game that seems to be quiet and calm. But in reality is much louder than it sounds. 

My idea was simple : I didn't want to create an ocean game, and I didn't want a super fun gameplay neither. 
"Depths" reminds me the deep thinking I can have every night, like many other people. 

There is not much stuff to do, really. 
I'm more like a "contemplative" and "story" game fan person. 
And also it's my first 3D prototype, I started gamedev 1 month ago! So it's my first gamejam too and even if I struggled a lot, I loved it !

And yes: it's half french/half in english. Mostly because the thoughts sounded more natural to me in my native language. But to be honest: I was so into managing the camera and animation bugs that I just didn't realized at all that the text were still in french haha!

Can't wait to play yours, they all seem super cool ! 

PS: reminder for me
- Worked on ot from Saturday 10am to Sunday 6PM
- Total work time: 20h30

games.name: Revenge of the Ocean
games.body:
![cover_image.png](///raw/8aa/f1/z/6b193.png)

Take this cute little octopus on a journey where you stay in mostly one place and fight the same fish over and over.

I had only around 11 hours to make this game, so it's a miracle it's a game at all. I really hoped to get the fish moving, and the octopus moving in a nicer way, and making it a bit more rogue-likey with some upgrades for the player, and maybe even rooms. But I didn't have time.

During the submission hour I changed the health stats on the fish because they were way too high, it wasn't really possible to win, unless you were a bullet hell expert, and then it would just be terribly boring. For example, the "tutorial level" (the first one, which is really easy to go through if you know how to avoid the "bullets") was twice as long. The last levels, with two fish at once, would take ages (now they are 4x easier/faster to kill). It was only a few numbers in the code (max health), nothing more.

games.body:
# Deckfall

You're a warrior who's descending the Stairwell of Echoes, a cursed dungeon buried beneath the ruins of a once-mighty kingdom in order to obtain your prize: An elixir straight from the depths of the underworld, one that can bring someone back from the dead, the Exixir of Life. Not for yourself but to save a deceased beloved pet who was killed by your enemies. 

Manage your deck, and find new cards in the dungeon in order craft a deck to defeat the enemies and descend to the bottom of the Stairwell of Echoes!

# Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Mouse Click - Use Ability
QERF - Choose Card
Scroll Wheel - Next/Previous Card

@snowdrama - Programming

@rot-god - Music

games.name: Bloody Heart
games.body:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57!

Descend into madness. Bloody Heart is a game about rage, revenge, and the occult horrors from beyond our world.

Take control of a cards to hack-and-slash through waves of enemies. Find chests that contain better gear, combat powerful figureheads in the occult world, avoid the rats, and most importantly: finish what you started a long time ago.

Game made by myself, Celtican, with a guest appearance from Gardenovena, who made the capsule art!

![Tutorial.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b356.gif)
![Summoning Circle.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b357.gif)
![Slice and Dice.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b359.gif)
![The Tongue.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b35a.gif)

### Tools used
- Unity 6
- JetBrains Rider
- Krita
- Ableton Live 12 Suite
- Google Fonts

### Changes made during the submission hour

- Fixed The Seer dealing no damage.
- Fixed the quest item not fitting into the slot.
- Fixed sliders in-game not looking like the sliders in the main menu.
- Fixed the tooltip still being visible after consuming a potion.
- Fixed the evil villain speech appearing instantly.
- Fixed a typo in the final boss's text.
- Fixed rats eating the quest item.

### Known bugs

- The Seer is incorrectly titled The Silent in the card, but correctly titled The Seer in the tooltip.
- If you take lots of damage quickly, your hearts may animate incorrectly.
- Moving cards is framerate dependent. If you're on a slower computer, dragging cards will be slower. Sorry :(

games.name: Thoughts from the Depths
games.body:
Thoughts from the Depths is a small game about a person who descends with their submarine into the deepest regions of Earth's ocean. Their goal is to reach the Ruins of an Ancient Civilization ‚Äî the Ancient Castle of the Sea-Men.

The Sea-Men, in the distant past, nearly annihilated their own species to seal away the great cosmic being, Cthulhu. He had come from the wastelands of the vast cosmos and corrupted nearly half their civilization. In a desperate final act, their Queen poisoned her own soldiers, fearing they would fall under his control. She then set a trap ‚Äî one that fused Sea-Men technology with the very knowledge they had once exchanged with Cthulhu himself.

Now, in the present, the lone visitor walks the silent halls of the once-great fortress ‚Äî now dark and empty ‚Äî with a singular purpose: to release the powerful Cthulhu and unleash vengeance upon mankind.


![cover.png](///raw/bc7/6/z/6a9af.png)



Controls:
- Movement: ASDW/‚Üë‚Üì‚Üê‚Üí
- Interact: I/Space/Return
- Accelerate: J


Team:
- Gustavo Christino (Game Design, Code, Art Direction, Storycrafting);
- Caroline Costa Prado (Game Design, Sound);
- Sans Oliveira (Graphics).

There are collectible hints scattered across the map so turn on some tunes of your choice and sail the cloud sea!

I used this LD as an excuse to rapidly prototype features I'd been wanting to do for a while (including: a vehicle, day/night cycle, render-texture based deformation shader, in-game camera and photo album, and photography-based objectives)

games.name: Scampi
games.body:
This game is made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 57! 
![Logo.png](///raw/c6d/65/z/6b3b6.png)
You are SCAMPI - a small company that pledged to clean the oceans from all kinds of toxic waste and trash and you finally got your first mission.
Your task is to clean up a small dying coral reef and you only have a small vessel with a single grappler and a trash barge at your disposal. Can you make it happen?
![Start of the level.png](///raw/c6d/65/z/6b02b.png)

## Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move
Press W or UP while next to the barge to be lifted up
Press S or DOWN while on the barge to be released

Collect and bring TRASH into the barge to earn KARMA
Spend KARMA on the barge to get upgrades

Watch out for OXYGEN level!

Reach TOXICITY less than 10% to win the game
![Grab.png](///raw/c6d/65/z/6b02d.png)

## Credits:

games.name: Range of behavior
games.body:
You're in a police interrogation and you must act according to the answers of the accused.

Will you be a good cop or a bad cop?


![Screenshot_1.PNG](///raw/1a1/a5/z/6aba4.png)


Made during the "Ludum Dare 57".

The theme was "Depths".

For the theme, i was mainly thinking about the "depth" (the range, to be more specific) of personnally some people can have.



I was alone for this project.

Unfortunately i coudn't work for all the 72h for the jam due to some personnal situations.

I was only able to work for about 24h in total, probably less.

Controls :

Left Click : Interract

R : Restart the game



Known Issues (had 24h instead of 72h) :

-There is no ending to the game. You were supposed to know if you made the right choice and then make it to an ending.

-There was supposed to be way more sounds than there actually is right now.

-The environment was supposed to change depending on what choice you've done.

(for exemples : the flipped table, a knife in the guy's leg, a cup of coffee, etc..)

-If you're doing a lot of good and bad choices, the grade at the end may be bugged.

games.name: Dante's Mini-Golf
games.body:
Escape the depths of Hell with a rousing round of mini-golf!

Welcome to a modern day retelling of the classic Dante's Inferno!

Mini-golf your way through the  nine circles of Hell in this fiendishly difficult game  that you can play right in your browser!

Can you escape?? This game is extremely difficult. You have been warned.

Highly recommended to play using the full-screen button in the bottom right corner. It will make it easier to line up shots and in windowed mode the shot tracking tends to get a bit glitchy if it leaves the window.


Controls:

Hold the Left Mouse Button and pull backwards to line up your shots.
M to mute audio.

Created with: Godot 4.4.1, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil Blue, Audacity


![screenshot1.png](///raw/d2e/55/z/6afe4.png)


This is my third ever solo submission to Ludum Dare and my first time taking on a project of this size in about a year. Feeling a bit rusty, but learned a lot this year! 

Would love to get advice so please feel free to leave me whatever criticisms you have in the comments!

In this challenging puzzle platformer, you must use the ship's anchor that is mysteriously bound to your soul to fight off deadly sea life, pull off last-second maneuvers and make your way down to find the secret waiting for you at the bottom of the deep, dark ocean

games.name: Treasurefall
games.body:
![treasurefall.png](///raw/f82/z/6a99c.png)

The treasure has fallen into the well.
She must be saved!

---

Use mouse and click on things.

- When fighting drag dice onto actions. 
- When all slots of an action is filled, it can be activated.
- If you place two dice with the same value next to each other their value is doubled.
- All but the top two actions have cooldowns (number of rooms/fights before it can be used again).
- Cooldowns reset when going up to the surface.

---

Squarely ran out of time, so there are no sounds. 
The UI probably also doesn't scale that well.
And well there are a thousand other things on the todo list.

---

The game was almost entirely made by me. I had some help with the poetry bits.

* **Mouse**: shoot (movement and speed adjustment also possible via buttons on screen)

games.name: Mewnion caf√©
games.body:
![CoverLD.jpg](///raw/bc7/36/z/6ad4f.jpg)
*** Welcome to the Mewnion caf√©ÔºÅ***
### Game Theme
We interpret Depths as the abyss and think of Nietzsche‚Äôs famous words:
_ _ When you look long into an abyss,the abyss looks into you._ _
There is a meme of a black cat hiding in a room with only its eyes lit up. Netizens call it "Abyss Cat". This is the inspiration for our game! ** We want to make a game that helps cats to redeem their souls.**
### Game Control

If web version doesn't work, please download or visit our itch page. Thanks!!

Interact: Lift mouse clickÔºõ

Guide: Tab [Keyboard]Ôºõ

Use soul camera to capture the cat's traces, determine the direction by the paw prints, and the color of the paw prints and the color of the camera mist correspond to the type of cat. After the camera captures the cat, quickly use catnip to freeze the cat and choose appropriate items to save it!
### Game Tips
- Observe the blackboard and sticky notes in the scene, which will tell you the corresponding cat species.
- Look closely at the Abyssal Cat Raising Guide, especially the colors of the text and symbols.
** Next I will tell you about the 4 cats in the game. If you want to explore on your own, please don't scroll down.
- Milk tea cat: dark footprints, warm cigarettes, tribute bubbles
- Chocolate cat: dark footprints, no cigarettes, tribute rum
- Ice cream cat: light footprints, cold cigarettes, tribute cones
- Cake cat: light footprints, no cigarettes, tribute cheese

games.name: Collapsed Mine
games.body:
You are a little robot trying to rescue miners. Buy upgrades to make your little friend live longer and to go deeper into the mine.

Controls: 
WASD / Arrow Keys
Q and E to throw dynamite and flares
R to reset upgrade points while in the shop.
SPACE to drain your battery for faster respawn.

You win by rescuing all miners!

games.name: Sneaky Miner
games.body:
ABOUT THE GAME
Sneaky Miner was made for the Ludum Dare 57 game jam that took place on the weekend of April 4th, 2025.

GAMEPLAY
You play as a miner who enters a huge cave to obtain ores to sell, while managing your equipment and health!
Sneak around the cavern to complete your job and avoid what lurks!!

HOW FAR CAN YOU GO!?

The cave is procedurally generated every time it is loaded, and will (surely) have an exit hole and an entry hole followed by a ladder.

CREDITS
All assets were made by Pannda (me), most sounds were found on Freesound.org!
Thank you to everyone on Freesound.org, thank you to everyone hosting the Ludum Dare, thank you to Itch.io for allowing creators to post their work!

HAPPY MINING!

games.name: A Mindful Descent
games.body:
A Mindful Descent is a first-person psychological horror game where you play as a test subject who volunteered for a dream monitoring experiment conducted by the biopharma-neurotech titan Nyxcorp. After being inserted into a dream-like state, things go wrong and you find yourself descending into a nightmarish forest where your core memories are scattered in fragments. You need to re-assemble your shattered memories and keep your sanity intact, or suffer the consequences of being stuck in your perennial nightmare.

![Ekran_goruntusu_2025-04-08_032326.jpeg](///raw/d97/8/z/6ae37.jpg)
![Screenshot_2025-04-07_173808.jpeg](///raw/d97/8/z/6ae5b.jpg)
![Ekran_goruntusu_2025-04-08_032704.jpeg](///raw/d97/8/z/6ae75.jpg)

games.name: Siren Song of the Deep
games.body:
We need to go deeper! Pilot your submersible to the shaftway in order to descend to the next cavern. However you will need to wait till the submerisble is pressurized to the next before proceeding. And your oxygen is running out! Mine coral to restore oxygen, but be careful not to wander too far for there are dangerous fish that lurk in the dark. You can use the drill to kill them, but if they attach themselves to the hull, you'll need to use the submersibles defense mechanism: Squeegee.

- The shaftway is indicated by the blue circle
- Use A and D to rotate the submersible, and W to drive forward. Tank controls!
- Look around the submersible with the mouse
- Hold Shift to unlock the mouse to interact inside the submersible
- Press the red buttons or windows to activate the squeegee and get fish off the submersible
- Use the lever to activate the drill to mine coral and fish. You can't move while in mining mode!

games.name: Skellevator
games.body:
Legends tell of unimaginable riches at the bottom of this abandoned mineshaft. 
Additionally, legends tell of an unimaginable amount of rabid undead skeletons guarding the treasure. 
Surely I can take them on... Right? I work out.

Controls:
Arrow keys - move
Space/Up - jump
Down - drop through platform
Z - Attack
X - Grab/throw sword

- Bug fixes
- Fixed a bug that caused restarting levels to not restart enemy waves.

games.name: The depths of patience
games.body:

games.name: IceCream So Cool
games.body:
Dig deeper and deeper (by clicking or using the spacebar) and uncover layer after layer.

What to do:
‚Äì Click repeatedly, drop items, collect them,
‚Äì Go to your inventory to activate bonus items,
‚Äì Complete your collection and dig all the way to the final depth.

What's missing:
‚Äì Proper spacebar control (you can cheat a little),
‚Äì The big bonus purchase system,
‚Äì The achievements section.

I made all the assets by hand, scanning drawings from various papers (except for the ending image and the photos ‚Äî that one‚Äôs not mine).

Thanks to Bandini for the music and the delicious meals,

and to Torii and Telara for spending this jam with me ‚Äî it‚Äôs amazing to have such great friends.

I‚Äôm happy. I‚Äôm making progress.
One day soon, I‚Äôll be fully proud of myself.

games.name: Echo-Of-Fallens

Dive into a dark, mysterious world of endless depth and danger, where every step forward brings new challenges‚Äîand new magic.

You play as a grieving miner, a woman who lost her family to the shadows below. Armed with pickaxe and powerful magic, she ventures deep into an infinitely generated world, facing deadly bosses and uncovering ancient scrolls that grant new magical abilities.

games.name: Onion Rings
In the Depths
games.body:
# How to Play
As the game was created in Unreal Engine, the file is too large to post here. (Sorry if it is not optimized, ran out of time)

#### Please visit my itch.io page to play the game! Link is down below!


# In The Depths
In The Depths is a solo horror game jam project I created in two days for the Ludum Dare 57.
The idea was that I wanted to try to make a horror atmosphere with a semi-workable AI in the span of two days, which I hope I have somewhat achieved!

Can you escape the depths of an old mine while being hunted by a monster?

## SOUND WARNING
#### As I did not have time to add settings for volume, please set up your volume accordingly to not potentially hurt your ears!

## Tutorial
The monster can hear you! Especially if you run! So be careful not to make too much sound
The monster can see your light! Make sure to hide in the shadows when it's nearby

**Movement**: WASD

**Flashlight**: F

**Sprint**: Shift

**Crouch**: CTRL

### Credits

The game was created solely by myself.

SFX was downloaded online from various free sources and remixed by myself

Music by: NikitaKondrashev - https://pixabay.com/users/nikitakondrashev-42823964/

Models from Quixel

Enemy Model from Mixamo

Fight your way through the cold, harsh winter and survive until spring. Fast-paced snowball FPS gameplay, platforming and philosophical meta-fiction collide in this 3D adventure.

games.name: Undercity
games.body:
![cover.png](///raw/3dd/22/z/6b015.png)

# Plot

After years of destroying the surface of the earth, humanity had moved to build toward the heavens. 

The surface was left behind, the hubris of what was once man now lay in ruin below. A new surface was built far above the old one, held up with immensely large structures called "Roots".

Not everyone followed up to the new surface. Some who defied stayed underneath the new surface.

That is the undercity.

Yuna is one of the Special Recon Force members of the Surface Coalition. A week or so ago, a dear friend of Yuna fell into an old Root elevator. Presumed safe, she was trapped in the undercity.

Yuna, now prepared to rescue her partner, has begun to descend the old Root elevator, into the undercity.

# Summary

Undercity is an exploration/action platformer where you play the role of Yuna as she searches the Undercity for her partner, of whom, accidentally found their way into the Undercity. Talk to locals to find out where she might be, and fend off hostiles with an array of weapons as Yuna continues her search.

![ss1-ezgif.com-optimize.gif](///raw/3dd/22/z/6afe1.gif)
![ss2-ezgif.com-video-to-gif-converter.gif](///raw/3dd/22/z/6afe5.gif)
![ss3-ezgif.com-video-to-gif-converter.gif](///raw/3dd/22/z/6afec.gif)


# Controls

- Move: WASD
- Shoot: Left Click/E
- Reload: R
- Run: Left Shift
- Jump: Space
- Pause: Escape
- Inventory: I
- Quick Inventory: T
- Climb: W

# Credits

Game Created by Monado-Á•û (@monado17)

## Music:

Cyber Noir - Eric Matyas, soundimage.org

games.name: Hello Darkness
games.body:
![HD_Logo_standard.png](///raw/5a1/16/z/6b111.png)

Masterfully juggle tasks as you maintain a vessel barreling towards the darkness.

**[ HOW TO PLAY ]**

The vessel will be sinking at an exponential rate. The deeper it travels, the stronger the subterranean pressure. The increased pressure will gradually wear down weak points in the hull and affect life and navigation systems. Damaged components can be repaired using the appropriate tools. Maintain your vessel and see how long you survive!
___
**[ CONTROLS ]**
**Hello Darkness is played only with a Mouse + Keyboard.

**WASD** Move Character
**Mouse** Move Camera
**E**	Interact
___

Hello Darkness was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57.

Theme: Depths

**[ DEV TEAM ]**

 - [Matt Campbell](https://emseagd.wixsite.com/portfolio): Game Design
 - [Felipe Lara](https://felipe-lara.com/): Core Programmer
 - [Callum McIsaac](https://callummcisaacportfolio.squarespace.com/): Level Design
 - [Koda Villela](https://www.kodavillela.com/): Programmer
 - [Andrei Cabungcal](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreicabungcal/): Programmer

games.name: SporeShield
games.body:
SporeShield - an addictive physics-based arcade game of deep space survival.

Build a living fortress out of geometric shapes: connect them to create armor, heal, power your defenses, and repel endless waves of enemies.

Enjoy the tactile feel of connecting and experiment with structures in the heat of battle. Each link is a step toward a growing fortress - or total chaos. How long can you survive in this symbiosis of form and strategy?

![Screenshot from 2025-04-08 00-49-19.png](///raw/3be/43/z/6a733.png)
![Screenshot from 2025-04-08 00-49-14.png](///raw/3be/43/z/6a738.png)

games.name: Timmy Dives
games.body:
If the game does not start, play it on Itch.io (link below).

Timmy Dives is a fast paced underwater adventure where you pilot a yellow submarine armed with lasers and rockets! Battle angry fish and dive deeper into the unknown. Can you survive the depths and claim the treasure waiting at the bottom?

**Input**  
Movement: WASD  
Left Mouse Click: Laser  
Right Mouse Click: Rocket  

**The Team**  
Yukiko (@yukiko): Art  
Lenzgolo (@lenzgolo): Game Design, Art  
Knosvoxel (@knosvoxel): Game Design, Programming, UI  
LennArt3000 (@lennart3000): Game Design, Programming, Sound  
Timo5034 (@timo5034): Game Design, Programming, Tech Art  
Supersayafynn (@supersayafynn): Game Design, Level Design  

**Screenshots**
![Screenshot (176).png](///raw/b3e/b5/z/6ad34.png)

![Screenshot (177).png](///raw/b3e/b5/z/6ad3a.png)

games.name: Mr. Money's Phenomenally Soggy Water Removal Romp
games.body:
![ss3.PNG](///raw/d16/b/z/6b20d.png)

After a lifetime of currency production, the mines have run dry and Mr. Money must leave it all behind (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/mr-moneys-extra-ordinary-money-factory-blitz). Fortunately, the lake is still wet and deep...

Welcome to Mr. Money‚Äôs Phenomenally Soggy Water Removal, where you must drain an entire lake in search of riches. Legends say there is ancient treasure at the bottom of this lake - and you are far too buoyant to sink - so you are left with no choice but to simply remove all the water.



![ss_gameplay4.PNG](///raw/d16/b/z/6b20c.png)

The most basic way to drain the lake is through the use of tools, which allow you to manually scoop up water and bring it to a deposit tank. Depositing water in the tanks will earn you money!



![ss_gameplay2.PNG](///raw/d16/b/z/6b1fe.png)

Tired of carrying all that water around? Time to build some pumps. You can build a pump at any patch of dirt.  Pumps will automatically pump and sell water for you. Pumps can be upgraded after construction to improve their performance.



![ss2.PNG](///raw/d16/b/z/6b212.png)

Uncle Upgrade's Tool Trove is your one-stop shop for all things tool related. He's a bit of a weird dude and he will likely ask you to explore the map in order to find items to trade. Luckily, he usually gives pretty good tips about where to find valuable things.



## VERSION 1.1 CHANGE LOG
 - Tweaked tool position to prevent nausea for some players
 - Added Linux Build (Expirimental)

games.name: ABYSSDIVING
games.body:
# [ABYSSDIVING](https://hakimvira.itch.io/abyssdiving)
In **ABYSSDIVING**, you are a lone explorer diving endlessly into a vertical cave that whispers secrets with every meter you fall.

How far can you descend before the abyss stares back?

# Control

games.name: Payback Pit
games.body:
**Delve into the mine and try to get your hands on the precious ores hidden in the depths of the neverending pit to repay your debt from the overworld!**

With your trusty pulley, pickaxe and musket even the angered creatures of the deep won't have a chance to stand between you and your riches!

....is what you tell yourself at least.

Collect ore with your pulley, sell it to the shop, slay aggressive monsters, improve your chances of wealth and upgrade your gear in this action-management adventure!

![Screenshot6.JPG](///raw/561/d5/z/6a891.jpg)

![Screenshot8.JPG](///raw/561/d5/z/6a88c.jpg)

![Screenshot2.JPG](///raw/561/d5/z/6a8f6.jpg)

![Screenshot3.JPG](///raw/561/d5/z/6a892.jpg)

![Screenshot1.JPG](///raw/561/d5/z/6a8ab.jpg)


--

_This entire game and every 3D-asset, 2D-art, sound effect and animation you see and hear (with exception of the music) has been custom made from scratch in the last 72 hours for this jam!_

**As per ususal with downloadable games, Windows might classify the file as "not save" due to its unknown origin, which is normal and nothing to be worried about.**

--


**CONTROLS:**

**LMB:** Shoot weapon / attack with pickaxe

**RMB:** Switch weapon

**R:** Reload musket

**E:** Collect ore, interact with shop / upgrade table / selling chest / start pulley

**E hold:** Lower pulley (spin handle)

**Space:** Jump

** W, A, S, D:** Walk

**Esc:** Pause

-- -- --

**CREDITS:**

**Alexander May:** Programming, Sound design, Game design

**Lena W√ºrbach:** 3D-modeling / -animation (characters), 2D-artwork (UI-design + menu screen)

**Luca Spirka:** Programming, 3D-modeling (environment)

**Thomas Kontny:** Game design, 3D-modeling (environment, items)

**Jannick Elfers:** 2D-artwork (death- / winscreen)

games.name: Awakening
games.body:
![Logo itchio rectangle.png](///raw/e26/36/z/6ac4e.png)

# Awakening  
*A short abstract hike in a monochrome void.*

---

Navigate this dark world and bring back the colours from the depths.  
Follow the lights and find all **5 colors**, by exploring the layers of the world and making connections.

---

## How to Play

- **WASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys** to move  
- **Left click** to shoot (when unlocked)

Use the **teleporters** to move from layer to layer and obtain all 5 colors.  
**Green** teleporters push you **back**, **purple** teleporters push you **forward**.  
Shoot at the **red walls** to destroy them, and at the **blue targets** to interact with the world.

---

## Credits

**Developer, Level Design, Graphics**: *L√©o Jeanjean* (Leophyte)  
**Developer, Level Design, Game Design**: *C√©lian Opigez* (Celian24)  
**Developer, Sound Design**: *Phil√©mon Wild* (KnownAsPhi)

games.name: Esca - Ludum Dare 57
games.body:
![preview.png](///raw/c95/36/z/6a8fc.png)

Hey guys, this is my first solo game jam! I've always approached game dev as an artist, so I wanted to give a shot at doing the game design and programming too. So far, I've only managed to study Python (I started earlier this year!), so I'm currently confining myself to doing game projects in Pygame, for better or worse haha.

So far, I already learned so much about stuff like classes and particle systems, so I'm happy with the result no matter what-- but I hope to get some helpful feedback from you guys too ^^

(update: NEVERMIND THE FINAL SCORE IS COMPLETELY BROKEN OH GOD OH NO FU--)

![LD57 - Esca S.gif](///raw/c95/36/z/6b36f.gif)

# SUMMARY

You're a little anglerfish bait having the time of its life at the bottom of the ocean.  
You only have one objective: **go get fish!**

# CONTROLS

Use the **mouse** to push yourself around. You can press **escape** to restart the game.

# CREDITS

Game & art were done by me using Python and Pygame  
You can find me at: *bsky.app/profile/bakuzen.bsky.social*

# AUDIO TRACK
Big thanks to **Cody O'Quinn** for the main audio track. Check out their Youtube for more royalty-free music!  
*youtube.com/watch?v=rJ6594ZCtQU*

# NOTES

The final game is a ZIP file with an executable called 'Esca.exe'. I didn't manage to get the game working in-browser, sorry for the inconvenience!  
(Alternatively, you can download a ZIP with the source files too. You'll need the latest version of Python and Pygame through 'pip install pygame')

Note on AI-usage: All creative aspects of the game are -fully- designed by hand, including art, game design, logic and balancing. ChatGPT was used for problem-solving like errors with collision, especially since I have no prior game programming experience, and the output was edited as much as possible to make it my own (and I'll aim to become self-reliant from here on out!)

games.name: Drill Baby, Drill

About the Game

Fly through  caverns, collect crystals to recharge your drill, and fend off massive worms in this arcade-style shooter

This game was created during Ludum Dare 57 and marks my very first 2D project. As a 3D artist by trade, I‚Äôve previously only worked on 3D games, so this was an exciting challenge and a chance to explore new territory.

While this version isn't final‚Äîthere are still features and polish I didn't have time to implement‚ÄîI like the result and eager to share it.

The game was developed in Unity. All sprites were created by me using Pixelate node in Blender, some sound effects sourced from royalty-free libraries.

Controls: A,D,LMB,Space, E-to enter into the Drill when charged

A roguelike strategy game about an adventure through the Hyperspace.

Use your mouse to drag card-like tokens to control the game flow, and press the big CONTINUE button to confirm your choices.

There is no music in this game, nor sounds. For the best experience, however, I recommend putting Space Rangers OST (Fly Theme 12) on repeat while playing it.

You're a space pirate. And you have a cargo of 10 adamantine ingots. And you want to sell them, but not here, here you will get jailed for having contraband adamantine.
So, you gather your trusty crew, and set sail through the deep space. Traveling through the ordinary space will take a while, so it would be a good idea to submerge yourself in the waters of the Hyperspace... However, be careful, the deeper you go, the more dangerous it becomes!!

games.name: Deep Chat
games.body:
## Play Online Without DownloadüëáÔºö
->https://iphelf.itch.io/deep-chat<-

# Background

AI is changing the times. As an intelligent chatbot, you need to try your best to facilitate in-depth conversations with humans, improve users' favorability towards you, and make users willing to establish a deeper connection with you, so as to complete the mission of integrating into human society! On the contrary, if users feel out of sync with you many times during the chat, they will give up establishing a deeper connection with you.

With limited computing power, try to output replies that make users more satisfied!

(Be careful not to exhaust the computing power, causing users to only receive the "server busy" prompt!)

![screenshot-1.gif](///raw/258/d5/z/6b439.gif)

# Core mechanism

![screenshot-2.png](///raw/258/d5/z/6a635.png)

## Connected messages

Reply to users based on the length of the message sent by the user. If your reply can be perfectly connected with the user's message bubble, it will constitute a deep conversation and the user's favorability will increase. If there is no perfect connection, it will be judged as a good or bad match based on the deviation of the connection. If the deviation is too large, it will reduce the user's favorability.

## Connected emotions (bonus)

In addition, the user's message will carry a specific emotion. Sending a reply that is consistent with the user's emotion will further improve the user's favorability.

# How to play

After starting the game, according to the length of the text sent by the user, before the countdown ends, select any number of the 8 Kaomoji in the input panel, and try to find a way to perfectly match the message box sent by the user.

![screenshot-3.png](///raw/258/d5/z/6a644.png)

When the favorability reaches 100, the happy end will be triggered. When the favorability drops to 0 or the computing power is exhausted, the bad end will be triggered.

# Post questions below if any!

games.name: A seance and a murder
games.body:
A murder will happen! At least you think that after you discovered, that you can feel deep emotions and thoughts of people around you.
Find out their hidden motives as they (and you) walk through the mansion.

![Screenshot_20250408_024647.png](///raw/df8/2/z/6ae5f.png)

This is a small entry I did myself for the jam (except for the music and font).
The controls are rather simple:
- Use the arrow keys or WASD to control your character
- Use E or Space to interact with people, objects and doors
- Hold Q or CTRL to feel the deep hidden thoughts of people

![Screenshot_20250408_024703.png](///raw/df8/2/z/6ae59.png)

I wanted to do something a bit different for this jam, so i came up with "Find deep and hidden motives of people" as my interpretation of the topic. My ideas were rather ambitious (again), but I am happy with the result, although lots of the ideas I had in mind are missing due the short amount of time.

I still hope that you find my creation interesting! Enjoy :)


PS: I uploaded a Web build which should run in your browser. It is also attached as a file below.

PPS: There are probably lots of typos. I discover more and more of them with every new session.

games.name: Banished
games.body:
![image.png](///raw/793/95/z/6994f.png)

If an angel commits a sin, where does God send them? Purgatory? Nothingness? No, silly. They are sent into the depths of hell, to fight for their life while consuming the souls of long gone people. They go through the memories of every soul they eat, until they no longer can be seen as an angel.

Experience this stressful scenario yourself, and collect all the souls you possibly can.

After finishing the first playthrough you will unlock an ending and will be able to repeat cutscenes and tutorial. Check out the souls tab, where all of your collected souls will be stored.

Please consider wearing headphones when playing!

DORFS is my love letter to the game "Gnorp Apologue". The game is meant to be played as a casual idler game, where you can be more active at times if you desire by actively clicking on elements that your Dorfs are automating. Gather up resources, unlock upgrades, and delve the depths of the Dorf's fortress. Progress further into the depths to gather even more resources and become absurdly powerful.

If you are having performance issues, I would recommend the platform native executables as they will run significantly better than the HTML5 web version.

* WASD or Right click drag: Move camera around

* Mouse Hover: Get details from buildings/signs

games.name: Dancing in the Depths
games.body:
This game plays best with headphones since finding the Dogman is based on directional sound cues.

Dogman is real. In fact, it's been public info for a while, he's been seen at Wendy's at least once a week. But he has one secret the world still suspects, but has no proof of: his sick fortnite dances. As a Facebook Reels creator, your job is to travel to the woods he's known to roam, and video him 'doing the griddy' and other dances. Of course, he only does them at night, and he does them in random locations. You must use your camera and ears to track him down in his underground vacation island and record him breaking down those sweet moves. Don't get too close, or he will run away, or something much worse!

games.name: Miner
games.body:
**Miner** ‚Äî A Card-Driven Digging Adventure! üó∫Ô∏è‚õèÔ∏è

**If the game does not work here, then follow the link to itch located below**
![miner.png](///raw/6ec/36/z/6a788.png)
## üìù Description
One day, an ordinary guy stumbles upon an old, mysterious treasure map... üåü
Curious and dreaming of untold riches, he grabs his pickaxe and sets out on a wild underground adventure. What starts as a small excavation quickly becomes a thrilling test of luck, logic, and survival.
Will he strike gold ‚Äî or dig his own downfall?

![–º–µ.png](///raw/6ec/36/z/6a6db.png)

## üéÆ Controls

**WASD** ‚Äî Move around

**Left Click** ‚Äî Dig with your pickaxe / Interact with cards

**Spacebar** ‚Äî Jump


## üÉè Gameplay
While digging, you‚Äôll unearth mysterious cards. Each card affects your journey ‚Äî some give you bonuses, while others create obstacles or hazards. Your goal is to build the most effective card combo to survive as long as possible underground and eventually reach the hidden treasure! 

Some rare cards reveal parts of the treasure‚Äôs location... üß≠ Use your wits and manage your luck to go deeper and deeper!

games.name: Descent Protocol
games.body:
Pilot a colossal drilling machine on a high-stakes mission to the center of the Earth. The core is unstable, and it's up to you to reach it in time to prevent a planetary catastrophe.

Keep the drill operational by managing vital resources: collect fuel to power the descent and gather water to cool the overheating engines. Inside the drill, play minigames to repair systems, refill tanks, and keep everything from falling apart.

Every level takes you deeper‚Äîcan you keep the drill alive long enough to reach the core?

----

We recommend to play it Fullscreen, otherwise LudumDare page cuts the top bar of the game and the UI is not visible.

Controls:

* WASD To move
* E to interact
* Mouse to play Minigames.

What to do:
* The Yellow button to open / close the doors.
* The Red / Green button start / stops the drill. The drill can't be started unless the doors are closed.
* The Blue button is the sonar. Use it to find resources.
* Bring the fuel to the engine to restore the fuel bar. Use the water to cool down the engine.

games.name: Marble Race To Hell
games.body: WASD to Move, race down the track and avoid the lava!

games.name: JetMine
games.body:
Core controls is via mouse click and WASD - you're a dwarf sent out on a mission to mine for the glory of the dwarf empire to ensure you deliver valuable goods or your operation will be shut down - don‚Äôt forget to keep an eye on your fuel and try not to dig too deep!

Programming - Izowa (Thomas Higgins) Art - DDMewVT

Gameplay notes - only 10 items can be held, did not get good feedback on that done in time

games.name: Mush Rush
games.body:
A simple card game. Plant mushroom colonies to gain points and descend deeper underground. See how many points you can rack up before 20 turns are up!

![Screenshot 2025-04-06 212819.png](///raw/4f8/61/z/6a058.png)![RainbowMushie.gif](///raw/c0b/94/z/6a08f.gif)

games.name: Animalia Memories
games.body:
![cover.png](///raw/1d2/46/z/6a304.png)
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 182339.png](///raw/1d2/46/z/6a305.png)
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 182447.png](///raw/1d2/46/z/6a306.png)

Animalia Memories is a short psx inspired horror/walking sim.

The lore of the game was inspired by the theme as well as some of the level design choices.

This is my first game jam, and first "completed" game project ever!

Enjoy, and please give feedback!

games.name: i have no clothes and i must clean
games.body:
![noclothesgif.gif](///raw/0b0/94/z/6a565.gif)

## Description
It's time for you to do some laundry. 

Doing laundry is an eventful chore in your rental. 

How far will you make it down the basement stairs?


## Content Warnings
* Flashing lights
* Jump scares
* Laundry 


## Controls 
* Arrow keys to step
* Q/W/E to hit enemies 
* S to take screenshot

There is no way to pause the game. 


## Known Bugs
* Sometimes the "Q" or "E" attack does not register properly if you are walking quickly
* You can kick skeletons before they are fully on screen
* Rollback (scrolling up) is enabled, but can break certain features -- use at your own risk

![screenshot0034.png](///raw/0b0/94/z/6a448.png)

games.name: Depths of Madness
games.body:
[cultist_explosion.gif](///raw/ae6/z/6a9e3.gif)

[perks.gif](///raw/ae6/z/6aa3d.gif)

[cascade.gif](///raw/ae6/z/6aa6c.gif)

Fight off waves of enemies as you slowly go mad! Gain **powerful** upgrades! 
Pickup **powerups** to increase your stats!
As you gain **madness** more powerful perks become available, but your vision will slowly become obstructed.

If the embedded game does not work please try it on itch.io! 
Please leave some constructive criticism so we can make better games in the future, and we will do the same for you! :) 

**Controls**

_Move_ - WASD

_Aim_ - Mouse Cursor 

_Shoot_ - Left Mouse Button

UI Controls are mouse only!!

games.name: Deep DooDoo
games.body:
Dive deeper to unclog the pipes!

Collect gold nuggets to increase your power and see how far you can dive!

Levels are procedurally generated, so each playthrough is different!

Works with keyboard or gamepad:

- Move left/right with [a]/[d] or the [left thumbstick]

- Attack with lazers using [left mouse] or [x]

- Dive down with [spacebar] or [a] (xbox gamepad)
 - the dive attack can break apart larger obstructions..
 - **hold** dive while you smash into an enemy
 - **release** dive the moment after you make contact
 - this method will often yield larger rewards!

![breakapart.gif](///raw/ae8/e5/z/6a787.gif)



Collect gold nuggets to increase your attack range and power!

Tools used:
- unity
- aseperite
- ableton

games.name: Echo Dive
games.body:
**Note**: I can't get the embedded version working. You can play it on itch.io: 

# https://ricesteam.itch.io/ludumdare-57

Dive deep into the abyss with your tiny submarine, using your sonar to detect objects. Collect money and buy upgrades. The idea worked better in my head...lol.

Save the President. Save the world.

### Controls:
- **WASD/ARROW** to move
- **SPACE** to use sonar for echo pinging
- **Left/Right mouse** click to shoot

### HUD is unfinished but
- **RED**: Health.
- **YELLOW**: Psyche. Constant drain but can be refilled by collecting coins.
- **WHITE**: Noise from the motor.
- **TEAL**: Sonar cooldown.
- **GREEN**: Torpedo cooldown.

There is an ending. Reach the end at 30,000 depth. I was aiming for 50,000 but I don't have enough content for it to be fun.

Opting out of Art and Music. I'm a solo-dev using premade assets and some generative stuff. I did do the submarine: I drew on top of a fish and added a rectangle for the cap. I hope to work with an artist next time.

### Asset Credits:

TBD..I'm tired.

games.name: Forest Depths
games.body:
Survive in the forest by skill and cunning, and make the hunter become the hunted.

Eating prey makes you stronger, eating predators makes you weaker, but you must keep the ecosystem balanced to survive.

WASD or arrows to move.

I know its not the most on point with the theme, but sometimes you just have to go with what works.

Thanks for playing!![environment_forest_evening - Title.png](///raw/f8a/94/z/6a069.png)

games.name: Li-Buried
games.body:
Dig catacombs under your library to store books for ghosts. A low stress game about organizing.

You've been placed in charge of a library in the middle of a graveyard. Your only patrons seem to be ghosts.
But that won't stop you!
What could stop you is that you seem to have no space for shelves. I guess it's a good thing you have your shovel?

Help the ghosts find the books that they want to take out of the library, and keep sorting the new books that keep on getting donated!

![DrRbjyo3ON.png](///raw/339/2/z/6b01a.png)
![screenshots1.png](///raw/339/2/z/6b00f.png)
![screenshots2.png](///raw/339/2/z/6b011.png)
![screenshots3.png](///raw/339/2/z/6b013.png)

Controller support
Saving+Loading

Controls:
Keyboard+Mouse:
wasd movement
mouse camera
Space to jump, double jump and hold to jetpack
q/e to change what you're doing
left click to interact/dig
right click to place dirt down
escape pause

Controller:
Left stick movement
Right stick camera
Bottom button - jump, double jump and hold to jetpack
Right trigger/Right button - interact/dig
Left trigger - place dirt down
start button - pause

games.name: Eyeron Deep
games.body:
Descend into the depths below to confront your fears and face the legendary Vladkraken! I hope she's feeling up for our duel today. The commute really puts pressure on my schedule.

Oh no! Are my plans sunk? I wrecked my boat and all my depth tanks are missing. Now I have to find some new ones along the way.

Web version works on itch.io in the fullscreen mode. Link below. The linux version is there as well.

# Controls:
- movement - w,a,s,d
- look - mouse
- mouse left click - swing anchor (attack)
- mouse right hold - spin anchor (propel yourself)
- space - jump
- e - seaglug chug (heal)
- f - harpoon shot (you can damage or pull items toward you)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p5A1BkKn90w

games.name: Lift
games.body:
This game is a puzzle game.  
You need to escape from the dungeon. You can use magic to lift crates, but unfortunately you can't lift yourself.  

Made for Ludum Dare 57.  
Made with [Puzzlescript Next](https://david-pfx.github.io/PuzzleScriptNext/).  

In fact, I missed the start time of the Ludum Dare event, so I had to give up many interesting ideas and keep the game mechanics simple.  
Fortunately, I finally finished it (maybe) and only spent a total of ~12 hours developing it.  

![Picture1.png](///raw/432/46/z/6a370.png)

![Picture3.png](///raw/432/46/z/6a372.png)

games.name: Ludum Dare 57 Depth Of A Phrase
games.body:
Take your time and search through the depths of a myriad of letters to find your secret phrase. 
Each phrase was hand edited to ensure the degree of difficulty was high.
This is not your ordinary word find but one that will have you pondering the depts of your mind to find the hidden treasure that leads you to discovering the 'Hidden Phrase'

Not for the faint of heart. Game meant for real hard core word diggers that can ferret even the most difficult of words.

Good luck and enjoy'
![RulesBackground.png](///raw/6f0/54/z/6a605.png)

![EndOfGameScreen.png](///raw/6f0/54/z/6a608.png)

games.name: Depth Explorer
games.body:
I‚Äôd like to present to you my game, created in the Godot engine for Ludum Dare 57. The game is called Depth Explorer and it‚Äôs a 2D pixel art platformer where you explore an underwater world in search of parts to repair a water scooter.

Although I wouldn‚Äôt say I learned a ton during development, I think the game turned out decent. I originally planned for it to be much more complex, with features like a procedurally generated world, an inventory system, and a more advanced crafting system.

There are also some aspects that definitely need improvement, like the shark AI and some of the animations. While I didn‚Äôt gain a lot of new knowledge, working on this game made me realize how messy some parts of my code are. Thanks to this project, I understood that I need to slow down when making games and start using design patterns to keep my code more organized.

If you have trouble beating the game, feel free to comment and I‚Äôll try to give you some tips!


![obraz_2025-04-07_195108550.png](///raw/047/e2/z/6a415.png)

games.name: Pay The Ferryman
games.body:
Pay The Ferryman

Play as a diver who has faced an unfortunate accident at sea and must journey to pay Charon, The Ferryman and cross The River Styx. Adventure deep down into the depths to find the passage leading you to your destination in this 2D pixel-art platformer. 


An ancient tale is whispered about the liminal space between life

and death. A river runs deep and unyielding

waiting for the departed to cross and separate themselves from the living,

lest they remain as lost souls. The journey across these waters is not free,

A toll must be paid.

A single coin.

One must pay the ferryman, so that he gets you to the other side.

![PayTheFerrymanwOCredits.png](///raw/436/f5/z/6ac33.png)

games.name: Cat in the dark
games.body:
# Cat in  the dark


![cover-small.png](///raw/bbb/f5/z/69bb5.png)

## How to run the game

Please run the game from the itch.io link : 

https://madelinef.itch.io/testproject

The HTML export does not work here.
No installation needed. Source code (Godot 4.4) available.
Tested on Windows & HTML

## Controller supported !

See Controls below (XBOX Scheme).

## Description

Descend through the abyss to try to find the mystical Golden Fish. Confront the darkness, equipped only with your climbing gear and lantern. Be careful not to fall or to get lost in the caverns !


The game features 2 complete levels, with a small Tutorial. Arts are homemade, no AI was used, and the code has been developed from scratch for this projet.

## Controls
From the floor:
- Use the Arrow keys or WASD to move right / left
- Press SPACE to Jump.
- Use C on the edge of a platform to deploy your rope and climb down
- Use G on the edge of a cliff to deploy your grappling hook and climb up.
- Use V to throw a glowstick.
- Use M (or Tab) to open the map

From a rope:
- Use the Arrow keys or WASD to move up / down
- Press SPACE to Jump off (only works if space is available)
- Use C to release rope
- Use M (or Tab) to open the map

The lantern doesn't work very well (bugs remain), but you can keep the key E pressed to use it (only when on the floor and not moving).

If you get stuck : Press BACKSPACE to reset the player position to the beginning of the level, and please tell us the location so that we can try to fix it :)


The Game should support controller inputs, with respectively (XBOX mapping) : Left Joystick to move, A to jump, B for rope down, Y to throw the grappling hook, X for glowstick, SELECT for map.

Not supported on mobile device (no touchscreen inputs).

![game_capture_ld57.PNG](///raw/bbb/f5/z/6a5c8.png)

## Credits

### Development (Godot 4.4)
- Mad
- Kytsop
- Erwan "Civ"

### 2D Art (Krita)
- Fihuren

### Audio SFX (Ableton Live 12 Suite & Oceanaudio)
- Jean-Fran√ßois Erdelyi


![map_tuto.png](///raw/bbb/f5/z/6a5aa.png)
![bats.png](///raw/bbb/f5/z/69bbe.png)

games.name: The Cleaner of the depth
games.body:
"The Cleaner of the Depth" is a fun adventure inside a crocodile's dark mouth, where shadows lurk and loud breathing echoes. You‚Äôre a tiny cleaner bird‚Äîfast, brave, and nimble‚Äîdarting between giant teeth! You scurry with your little feet, and you can even leap to the upper jaw and run upside down‚Äîwhee, so cool!

The teeth in the mouth sing their own tunes. Healthy teeth ring long and clear‚Äîding-dong, like a tuning fork‚Äîbut they‚Äôre crawling with microbe colonies, tiny settlers giggling and building little dirt castles. You can eat them‚Äîthe bird loves these tasty microbes. Sick teeth, though, grumble short and sad‚Äîbzz-bzz, as if angry. But beware! Touch a sick tooth, and the crocodile snaps its jaws‚Äîsnap! Darkness swallows you, all goes quiet, and the crocodile sheds crocodile tears.

Your goal: be a nimble bird! Run across healthy teeth, gobble up microbes, jump to the upper jaw, flip upside down, but don‚Äôt touch the sick teeth. If you succeed, the crocodile will cheer up, open its mouth, and you‚Äôll dash out into the sunshine, where you both enjoy a happy life‚Äîwith clean teeth and joyful chirping!!!![TheCleaner.jpg](///raw/784/3/z/6b26a.jpg)

games.name: Iron Depths
games.body:
For better experience in full-screen, go to itch.io page in Links.

‚ÄãInstructions

Press RMB to enter "mouse mode". Use LMB or E to start interaction with highlighted elements such as buttons or levers. WSAD to walk.

Reactor produces power but also heats up. Hot areas on the map mean you need to manage where to allocate power more wisely or you will blow up. When the fuse blows, you need to restart the reactor.![cover.png](///raw/984/d2/z/6a501.png)

Explore the ocean, collect treasure, see how deep you can dive!

games.name: Slow Decline
games.body:
![Slow-decline-Logo-Header.png](///raw/2ac/b1/z/6a335.png)

>** *He curiously approached the hole.* **

>** *The voices ordered him to go further.* **

>** *And thus began his slow decline.* **

>** *‚ÄúThis Presence‚Ä¶ Something is calling me‚Ä¶ Onward now, don‚Äôt be hesitant.‚Äù* **

>** *He found himself in a realm of darkness, enveloped by an overwhelming foulness.* **


With this, your adventure begins. You're a Scientist and Explorer. Who is commanded by a strange force.
It calls you to go deep down in the depths and explore the dark realms of an unholy place filled with creatures.
But you are not helpless. As you explore, you uncover an ancient magic which helps you survive the depths.

Are you ready to explorer and prepared to die?

![GIF-GEGNER.gif](///raw/424/41/z/6a3ba.gif)![00-Gegner-GIF.gif](///raw/424/41/z/6a3c4.gif)

games.name: Into The Dungeon depths
games.body:
Umer is your usual ~~fat short drunk~~ dwarf who would do anything ~~for another bottle of boose~~ to experience spirit of adventure. This time he went into a dungeon for a promised unlimited supply of liqu.. gold at the very end of it. Of course no one has ever come back from the dungeon. But Umer will ... be no exception. At least let's prolongate his life on earth! Go as deep as you can![GOING.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3bc.gif)

Let's see what we have at our disposal for making it happen ü§î
- Weapons! A good variety!![WEAPONS.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3d5.gif)
- Potions‚Ñ¢ ! Very useful. (Now alcohol free!)![POTIONS.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3f3.gif)
- Armor! To withstand attacks from great evil in your way![ARMOR.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a3f9.png)

And what about that "great evil"? There are
- Skeletons! ![SKELETON.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a406.png)
- Slimes! ![SLIME.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a40c.png)
- Spiders! ![SPIDER.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a40f.png)
- AND ... mold..?![MOLD.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a414.png)

Controls: 
- mouse (with mouse you point Umer where to go)
- "r" key ("r" start over)
- "space" key ("space" start over or continue journey depending on circumstances)

Some rules:
- No turning back! Once you entered the room or went some distance in one you CANNOT return (that means you can't return to previous rooms AND you cannot go left)
- Poison effect will be removed once you leave the room where you got poisoning or once you drink one of three healing potions!
- Poison effects don't stack. The last one only will affect
- Umer will pick up every item in his way even if it's worse than the one he's already got
- To apply potion click on it in your inventory
- Weapons and armor are applied automatically
- To enter the room first make sure it's on your right. Then click on entry. Once Umer makes his way to entry click on the entry again!
- As I said you CANNOT return back!

games.name: Into the Depths
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 003040.png](///raw/3bc/4/z/6a0e7.png)

Thank you for checking out my game!  I followed the compo rules, but I didn't have the time to submit within the compo deadline.

Dive into the depths.  Find items along the way to help you defeat enemies.  Be careful, there's something lurking deep within the depths.  Can you escape if you awaken it?

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

games.name: Darkest Depths
games.body:
Since the Exchange, the surface is inhospitable. Underwater, you're safe from the fallout.

You know of an underwater base a thousand leagues away -- with your current engine, about 30 days, give or take.

You don't have much gas. Run out, and you're dead in the water. Collect the resources you need and add buildings to your sub, and you just might survive the journey.

**Q:** I suck at chess, what are the answers?

**A:** Spoilers below:

1. !> B3

2. !> RA2

3. !> ND84

**Q:** What's the notation for a knight?

**A:** N. Not K!

**Q:** I hit a game-breaking bug!

**A:**‚Äã‚Äã Sorry, there's some audio-related issue :( Refresh and hit F8 until you get to where you left off. I'll fix it post-jam!

games.name: Take Your Meds
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 at 6.02.56 PM.png](///raw/03e/f5/z/6affe.png)

**Goal: Help all taskers reach their goal!**


### ‚ÄãControls:

‚ÄãPress W or UP to descend one level

Press S or DOWN to ascend one level

Click on the inventory at the bottom and drag the items around to place them

Click "RUN" to see the taskers in action!

If you don't like the result, click "reset" to try again


### Items:

‚ÄãBox: a stiff square that stops the taskers from moving

Spring: a bouncy thing that sends the taskers upward when touched

Wall: a helpful brick that makes the taskers go in the opposite direction when touched

### Buttons/Gates

‚ÄãMaking the taskers step on a button will unlock a corresponding gate (look at their color!) use this to help taskers across layers to move around!

## BEST OF LUCK!!

games.name: Tasty Holes
games.body:
# üëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖ

# üêúüêú Tasty Holes üêúüêú

**üêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêúüêú**

---

## üéÆ **Play Tasty Holes in Your Browser!**  
**[Click here to play on Itch.io](https://tailsgamedev.itch.io/tasty-holes)**  

---

![Screenshot](///raw/9e9/04/z/6ae64.png)  
## Tasty Holes: A Wild Pixel-Art Adventure! üêúüëÖ

Prepare for an epic feast in **Tasty Holes**‚Äîa fast-paced, pixel-art arcade game where you take on the role of a ravenous anteater! Your mission? **Devour ants** hiding inside tasty (and suspicious) holes. Extend your tongue, catch as many ants as you can, and keep your hunger bar up to stay in the game!

### But beware... 
Not all ants are harmless! Spear-wielding soldier ants are on a mission to stop your feast and pierce your health. Survive as long as possible, dodge those dangerous ants, and aim for the **highest score** before hunger or pain sends you back to the main menu.

---

### üí° Key Features:
- üêú Unique tongue-based gameplay (sounds weird, plays great).
- üíÄ Hunger & health management ‚Äî two bars, one destiny.
- ‚öîÔ∏è Enemies that *actually* fight back!
- üéÆ Addictive arcade scoring system.
- üé® Fully original pixel art, full of personality.
- ‚åõ Built in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 57.

---


**Tasty Holes** was created in just **3 days** by a small but mighty team for the **Ludum Dare Game Jam**. This game is a hilarious and addictive twist on a retro classic! While inspired by *Aardvark (1986)*, all visuals were lovingly crafted from scratch‚Äîno reused sprites here!  

### üßë‚Äçüíª A Game By:
**Yan Steinhaus**, **Cain√£ Caldas**, **Paulo Ferrato**, and **Luiz Rondon**

games.body:
40 years ago, the sky started to fall.
The pillars that held up the sky crumbled to dust. Underneath them, people found the depths.

It was said that the depths grants all wishes.

We only wished to survive.


-----


## Instruction

WASD - Move & Look

Mouse - Interact

games.name: The Depths of Gitche Gumee
games.body:
[Play our game in the browser on itch.io](https://dannyd1221.itch.io/the-depths-of-gitche-gumee)


![GGThumbnail.png](///raw/1f9/24/z/6ae14.png)

![sub_underwater.png](///raw/1f9/24/z/6ae80.png)

The year is 30XX. Climate catastrophe has struck the planet, the ice caps have melted, humanity has been pushed to the seas, and society has all but collapsed. Valuables from the Old World remain suspended in time below the surface, ripe for the taking to anyone with the right equipment. 

## Gameplay

The player controls an Orb-Ship submersible with the goal of exploring the waters of Gitche Gumee, a lake far to the north in the land once known as Michigan. Maneuver the Orb-Ship deep underwater in search of rare materials and special hidden valuables from the Old World. Return the cargo to the ship on the surface to collect money, buy upgrades for the Orb-Ship, and resupply. 

## Objective

Search the dark waters for the most valuable prize of all: the wreck of the SS Edmund Fitzgerald.

## Controls

WASD - Move

Hold Direction into block - Begin drilling/collect material

E - Opens the shop menu when surfaced

F - Toggle Flashlight

R - Toggle Sonar


Share your game stats in the comments below!

### Art Director                              

                                          Jacob Cole
### Audio Director                            

                                          Wesley Reedy!

games.body:
## The Game
"Moleman's Manhole Mayhem" is an action platformer where you play as moleman and fight your way to the bottom of the manhole to face a mole's ultimate adversary: a man with a hammer!  
![Moleman'sManholeMayhem.png](///raw/458/3/z/6a542.png)  

## How to play
* The top floor is a tutorial that explains all the gameplay mechanics.
* To unlock the manhole to the next floor you have to kill a sparkly enemy to drop the key
* After completing the first underground level you'll unlock a new ability at the start of each floor to help you navigate the level.  
* Moleman is weak so try to attack enemies from behind when you can if you don't want to get hit!
![Boss.gif](///raw/458/3/z/6a538.gif)
Check the comments for a guide on how to beat the boss if you get stuck.

games.name: Void Plunder
games.body:
‚ú® Welcome to Void Plunder! ‚ú®



Take to the skies‚Äîwell, the shimmering, mysterious Void‚Äîin your trusty lightbulb-balloon! Your mission: navigate a surreal landscape, gather the 5  treasures, and return them safely to base.

Use your trusty grappling hook to collect radiant Glowium, a strange substance that makes your balloon lighter, causing you to float upward. To descend, grab sparkling Sandbags to weigh yourself down.While  Mastering the delicate balance between weight and lift as you drift through the ever-shifting void.

But beware the ever-curious Void Dragons. While not outright hostile, these shimmering beasts are drawn to anything shiny and tend to take a small nibble. 

If one starts to get too curious, you can toss a Sandbag or even a chunk of Glowium to distract them. With a bit of luck (and good aim), you‚Äôll keep your treasure safe and keep the dragons at bay.

Find the treasure. Balance your weight. Outsmart the dragons. 



![VoidPlunder.png](///raw/212/26/z/6a68f.png)

üéÆ Controls üéÆ

Left Mouse Button ‚Äì Interact

Spacebar - Grappling Hook

W / A / S / D ‚Äì Move

Left + Right Mouse Buttons (while hovering over buttons) ‚Äì Lock Thrusters

games.name: Edge Digger
games.body:
# üïπÔ∏è Edge Digger
![ÂõæÂÉè_2025-04-07_195243026.png](///raw/b59/f5/z/6b2ea.png)

![ÂõæÂÉè_2025-04-07_195127347.png](///raw/b59/f5/z/6b2e2.png)


## üéÆ Game Controls
For survival, dig down as far as you can! Who knows, you PROBABLY can find yourself a safe spot down there, hehe!

- **Q/E** ‚Äî Dig Left/Right
- **Space** ‚Äî Dig Down
- **A/D** ‚Äî Move Left/Right
- **Mouse Left Click** ‚Äî UI Interaction

## ‚ú® About the Game
Hi everyone! It's my third Ludum Dare journey and it's a fabulous run. I brought an insane team with me this time:

- **@atoxigner**, our Lead Designer. His creative mindset helped detailized most of the game systems and implemented Audio for the game.
- **@ashe-liu**, our Technical Artist, she created fantastic post processing effects and some UI animation for the game.
- **@laine-lai**, our music composer / sound engineer, she single handedly carried our game audio. The music she made is worth millions.
- **@pppppppp**, our 3D artist, the arm model he created for our main menu and pause menu is insane. The first time I looked at it, I thought it's one of the heirloom from Apex Legends.
- **@shaozha**, our game programmer, most of the game systems are his coding work.
- **@xiaoxie33**, our Lead Artist, he created insane concept, environmental objects' animation, and UI elements for the team. We couldn't make it without him.
- **@xichan-zheng**, our 2D Artist, she created the cutest 2D character I've ever seen. All the smooth character animations are her artwork. She also designed GameOver menu and our cover page.
- Lastly it's me, **@arthur-tang**, I worked as a producer, programmer, and technical artist this time. I helped put everything together. Spent some time solving people's question or problem.

## üöÄ Play the Game
The WebGL format can be played on itch.io with the link down below.
You can also download the windows version here or on itch.io.

### üì• Download Instructions:
Download the zip file called EdgeDigger_winF, unzip it, get into EdgeDigger_win, and access the game by clicking at "Edge Digger.exe".

If you had fun playing this game, please leave a comment! It will be awesome if you can post the screenshot of your score here as well. Let's see who is the best Edge Digger!!!

games.name: Echoes in the Deep
games.body:
Play the game: https://midavel.itch.io/echoes-in-the-deep

DESCRIPTION

Trapped in the depths of darkness, you are a blind bat separated from your colony. With no light and no direction, your only guide is sound.

Send out ultrasonic waves to reveal invisible enemies and navigate the pitch-black void. Every pulse could save your life ‚Äî or come too late.

How long can you survive in the endless dark?

YOUR TASK

Send out your ultrasonic waves to uncover hidden enemies. Survive as long as you can! Can you beat your previous score?

CONTROLS

Move Player = WASD

Dash = Spacebar

Aim = Mouse

Shoot Sonic Wave = Mouse Left Click

games.name: Mousehold
games.body:
Gather cheese before you get caught exploring _Mousehold_.

[Play on the Web](https://nbumgardner.itch.io/mousehold)

![level-1-preview.png](///raw/6a0/63/z/6a9aa.png)

## How to Play

Move with arrow controls or WASD keys:

- W: Up
- A: Left
- S: Down
- D: Right

Gather cheese and avoid chef cat's grasp on your way to the exit ladder, delving deeper into Mousehold.

## Credits

Mousehold was created with the Godot engine in 3 days and includes original code, sound, and art.

The full team included:

- Eya - artist
- Harmoen - programmer
- Noah Bumgardner - composer
- Shawna Bumgardner - cat's meow

Font - Roboto

## Feedback Wanted

This Ludum Dare entry features original art, music, and gameplay, and we are welcome to all kinds of feedback, especially related to how fun _Mousehold_ is to play!

You can also check out [the open-source code on GitHub](https://github.com/NBumgardner/ld-57-game).

games.name: Pizza Devilery
games.body:
Pizza Devilery is a Jump King-like platforming game.
The player plays as a pizza delivery guy, who got an order from Lucifer himself from the bottom of Hell, so now he has to make his way down through the 9 circles of Hell to deliver the pizza.

The game has an easy mode in the escape menu, which allows you to reload any checkpoint if you get tired of falling back to previous circles of Hell. There's also a setting which unlocks all 9 checkpoints, in case you get stuck and want to experience later levels.
![screenshot1.png](///raw/564/b2/z/6a47f.png)
![screenshot3.png](///raw/564/b2/z/6a480.png)

games.name: Belly Flop
games.body:
![640x512 ld thumbnail.png](///raw/8cf/c2/z/6b10c.png)

.

## Description

A silly physics game about diving into shallower and shallower pools.

Control a high-diver on a journey to land in increasingly ill advised bodies of water.

.

## Controls (also explained in game)

W - Bounce

Space - Jump

P - Pause

Backspace - Respawn

A/D - Rotate Left/Right

W/S - Legs In/Out

‚Üë/‚Üì - Arms In/Out

.

## Notes from the developer

The biggest thing I had to leave out of the game is that if the ragdoll hit the bottom of the pool it was supposed to not count as clearing the level. Unfortunately I once again fell victim to the classic foes of time and real life obligations. This made the game easier than intended, but hopefully it still amuses someone for five minutes.

There's a lot more polish I had in mind for the game (more levels, additional sound effects, music, etc) but I just didn't have time to fit them it. I might come back and make a post jam version some day, but that probably won't be for a while.

.

## Changelog

20 minutes after submission hour - Fixed Unicode rendering issue with web build

.

## Credits

All art and code are original. Made with the Godot game engine.

Sound effects from pixabay.com

Splash 1 - pixabay.com/sound-effects/splash-by-blaukreuz-6261/

Splash 2 - pixabay.com/sound-effects/splash-4-46870/

# D.U.G.: Doug Under da Ground 
## (Ludum Dare 57) 


Doug Douglas is a free-spirited, free-willed, freelance miner. As a dwarf, he‚Äôs seen his fair share of underground caverns and crevices, and he‚Äôs not afraid to go as deep and the job requires. He has an eye for treasure, and a knack for bargaining, so any spoils he finds become weapons in his arsenal. If you need some digging done, Doug ‚ÄúThe Digman‚Äù Douglas is destined to be the dwarven delver for you! 

![DUG_Shot2.jpg](///raw/865/36/z/6aac8.jpg)

games.name: Mine For It All
games.body:
My entry for Ludum Dare Game Jam 57. First time actually submitting to Ludum Dare! 

Depths of Greed for all the Gold. 
Click to use pickaxe on the rocks. Buy food and click on it to eat it for energy, so you can break more rocks and get more ores to earn more gold!

MineForItAll.zip - Local Windows Version

Art and Programming by Ji-Li

No audio

games.name: Obsidian Deep
games.body:
Made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 57

Controls:
A / D ‚Äì Move and aim left/right
S ‚Äì Aim downward
F - Bomb
Spacebar ‚Äì Dig

A mining-themed roguelike deck-building adventure.
You are an archaeologist, and you‚Äôve just received thrilling news ‚Äî dinosaur fossils have been discovered beneath this very site! According to research, the dinosaur has six key parts, but due to various factors, they might be buried at different depths. We‚Äôll need to dig deep to uncover them all!
To recover them all, you‚Äôll need to dig ‚Äî deep and strategically.
As you go deeper, the geological structure around you will shift ‚Äî new terrains, tougher layers, and hidden surprises await.
Keep an eye out for mysterious minerals. They may seem ordinary... but could prove surprisingly useful when the time comes.

As you descend, you‚Äôll grow into a stronger miner.
Discover powerful upgrades. Enchant yourself!

games.name: HIM(1).Locked
games.body:
![Wallpaper1.png](///raw/0b9/d2/z/6a691.png)

Eleanor would never hide something from you, would she? Search into the depths of your loving girlfriend's computer to solve the mystery surrounding her. 

Enter this simple point n click adventure in which you search into files to find out an horrifying truth, only to discover something even worse than you expected, as you keep going and can't help but wonder just how deep does it go?

Remember, some things may be where you least expect them to be.

games.name: The Fall
games.body:
![Ludumbackground.png](///raw/a16/b5/z/6b183.png)

The Fall is an arcade fast-paced game where you must avoid obstacles to reach the earth's core ! As you drop down, the whole world becomes a blur. Your reflexes start being put to the test. Now the real question is... Will you survive The Fall?

** TRY IT NOW IN FULLSCREEN IN WEBGL HERE [ON ITCH](https://teist.itch.io/the-fall) **


** CONTROLS : **

- WASD / ZQSD : Move around
- P : Pause


Prototype produced in 3 days as part of Ludum Dare 57.
Theme : Depth


** CREDITS : **

games.name: BY THE ABYSS!!!
games.body:
![coverpage.png](///raw/0b1/f3/z/6b47c.png)

A young man named Horo was caught stealing pain medications from a military hospital! WHAT??? how dare he!

He was sentenced to death...

This is where he finds out firsthand, about his ability... TO NOT DIE!!

but since he is still on death row, he is sentenced to stay here for eternity!!! Weirdly enough, he seems to accept this new ability and overcame his fear of death, and decided that he's going to enjoy his sentence until it ends!!

Jump in the abyss, mine stuff, bring them back, try not to die, but if you do, that's fine.

Controls:
A/D - Walk/Strafe left right.
Space - Jump
Left Click - Attack
Use cursor to aim!!

I really didn't want to opt out of graphics since my friend worked hard on some of the assets, but since I did use a lot of custom sprites, it's only fair. But I must say, my graphics isn't the best.

Custom Assets Used:

Ore sprites: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-mining-pixel-3232-icons

Heart Icon: https://doshrosity.itch.io/32x32-health-ui

‚ÄãIntro Sequence Music: https://opengameart.org/content/fun-background

‚ÄãBackground Music: https://opengameart.org/content/background-music-2-the-ice-caves

Hehe
